name: renewToken
description:
Renews the token.Passes a new token to the SDK. A token expires after a certain period of time. In the following two cases, the app should call this method to pass in a new token. Failure to do so will result in the SDK disconnecting from the server.
       The SDK triggers the TOKEN_PRIVILEGE_WILL_EXPIRE callback.
       The CONNECTION_STATE_CHANGED callback reports CONNECTION_CHANGED_TOKEN_EXPIRED(9).
returns:
0(ERR_OK): Success.
       < 0: Failure.
  -1(ERR_FAILED): A general error occurs (no specified reason).
  -2(ERR_INVALID_ARGUMENT): The parameter is invalid.
  -7(ERR_NOT_INITIALIZED): The SDK is not initialized.
